title: Biblical Predictions of the Apocalypse - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/12/18
itunes:title: Biblical Predictions of the Apocalypse - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/12/18
description:
George Noory and biblical scholar Pastor Paul Begley examine his research into end time prophesy from the Bible, and whether Anti-Christ is already on Earth and the Rapture may happen soon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
